titles.title: Unemployment Tax Repeal Act of 1999
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the inclusion in gross income of unemployment compensation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 10/28/1999--Introduced. Unemployment Tax Repeal Act of 1999 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the requirement to include unemployment compensation in gross income and the provision concerning the voluntary withholding on unemployment benefits.
